lead_paragraph: Serie A title rivals Napoli and Juventus extended their winning runs on Sunday but something must give next weekend when the pair meet in Turin in a much-anticipated showdown.

headline.print_headline: Title Rivals Napoli and Juve Look Ahead to Crunch Match
headline.main: Title Rivals Napoli and Juve Look Ahead to Crunch Match

snippet: Serie A title rivals Napoli and Juventus extended their winning runs on Sunday but something must give next weekend when the pair meet in Turin in a much-anticipated showdown....
